name: UIPreviewInteraction
desc: A class that registers a view to provide a custom user experience in response to 3D Touch interactions.

items.name: init(view: UIView)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized preview interaction for the specified view.

items.name: var delegate: UIPreviewInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: An object that acts as the delegate of the preview interaction.

items.name: var view: UIView?
items.desc: The view from which the preview interaction receives touch events.

items.name: func location(in: UICoordinateSpace?) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the location of the touch that started the interaction.
